remarks: The set of all hyperplanes of a left module or left vector space.  The vector ` v ` is called a generating vector for the hyperplane. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lshpset.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lshpset.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lshpset.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lshpset.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lshpset $p |- ( W e. X -> H = { s e. S | ( s =/= V /\ E. v e. V ( N ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = V ) } ) $.
$d S s $.
$d V v $.
$d W s v $.
